'''''In Her Fully Glory...''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Memories of Pairidaeza]]''.
<!--
==Gameplay Notes==
-->
==Trivia==
* The French name of this achievement is a reference to the autobiographical novels of {{w|Marcel Pagnol}}: ''La Gloire de mon père'' (''{{w|My Father's Glory}}'') and ''Le Château de ma mère'' (''{{w|My Mother's Castle}}''.)
